name: Tako Eats Cafe
description:
Tako Eats(TM) is hiring Tako chefs to serve at their newest Branch: Tako Eats Café. You got the job! Congratulations! Now your new life begins, bake cookies and other extremely healthy food and serve it to hungry Tako customers.

Controls:
   Move with WASD/Arrow Keys
   Interact with E or F
   Use Mouse for Menus
   (You can also use controller while in the levels, left stick/D-Pad for movement and South button for interaction)

Cookies need to be baked but will burn if left too long on the fireplace.

Game was originally planed as a simple copy of an old flash game, but then feature creep said hello and now it's slowly moving in the direction of Overcooked.

Game is now in Early Access, kind of

Top things on my TODO List are:
- More things to do (Coffee, Tea, Donuts?)
- Customers getting angry and leaving if left waiting for too long
- More Levels
- Progress bars showing progress of things cooking/baking
- more and better game feel (few more sounds, animated sprites...)
- Tutorial screen explaining what to do

- Things I still struggle with: ART
